Container.Name: Homarr
Container.Overview:
DESCRIPTION Homarr is a simple and lightweight homepage for your server, that helps you easily access all of your services in one place.
Live demo: https://github.com/ajnart/homarr/deployments/activity_log?environment=Production
NOTES • I have changed from DockerHub to GitHub image source as per in v0.1.4 changes done. • The default tag used in the template is 'latest', but you can use others if you want. Check the repo (images) to know them.
VERSION 1.1 (2022-05-24)
THIS PROJECT IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT, SO EXPECT BUGS AND LACK OF FEATURES
Container.DonateText: If you like my work, please consider making a little donation.

Config.Name: Storage (config)
Config.Description: This is the location for the internal data.

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: If you need, you can customize the internal port using this variable.
